Пока дбд не сделает нормальные сервера то игра неиграбельная. Тебя  выкидывает из игры говоря ,что у тебя слабый интернет . Про пинг я вообще молчу его никогда в этой игре не сделают нормальным . Да и выход работы над багами вызывает новые я считаю это не нормальным
Имба,хоть и мало играл.

Стааарый БДСМ'щик Терентий...
Палеткую халупы он ломает плетью.
На крюки сюрвов вешает снова и снова..
У него 1й ранг, он не помнит стоп слова.
...КХ-КХ..блеать. о чем это я? АХ да - помойка. То есть ДБД то есть Dude by dudelight.exe.
Наиграл я на ентой игре порядком 500 часов, поэтому могу спокойно делать тир-лист *свист* ХА!.
Ладно, если серьезно, то опытные игроки называют ее помойкой не просто так, давайте все по пунктам:
1) постоянно меняется баланс, кого-то бустят, кого-то нерфят..меняют аддоны, вводят новых шизиков в нашу дурку сущности, постоянно жалобы что от манодрочеров, то от сюрвомейнеров. (одно вечно: ЛЕГИОН ИМБА, ЛЕГИОН ВПЕРЕД. ТИР-1 и стабильный минус за катку) :))))))
2) Кста про нытьё...тут дело все проще - самая токсичная игра, даже не игра - комьюнити. Играешь с ноедом - черт, играешь без ноеда - "изиман" "бэби-киллер" и т.д. а если вы и мейнер легиона - лишитесь и заебете друзей
3) не фиксим тупые баги, но вводим новые+скины. Такая проблема есть везде и всегда, как читаки, так и кривой код, поэтому это можно опустить..ДА ДАЖЕ ХИТЫ КОНЧЕННЫЕ можно опустить, но вот балабольство от "pretty good job so far" - не отнять 12"Вас ждет что-то новенькое" "ну мы пока думаем" "это будет удивительно"/10
(опять скажут петух Ino кукарекает и ноет по всякой дичи) - НО! Я ИМЕЮ ПРАВО (голоса на Украине).
Из плюсов игры можно выделить разнообразия нашего ЛГБТ состава и гейпарада на крюках в подвале от буббы с инсидиусом.
Игра может затягивать, если вы как и БДСМщик Терентий потерпите и привыкните. Этой игры вам хватит, чтобы бухим в дровину завести 5генов, поорать над Мишей и съебаться клипая моменты "360про-мува" (опа, VAN, привет и не бухай так больше) :)
Надеюсь эту дичь кто-то будет читать, потому что так-то игра в коллекцию пойдет (кто в комменты кукарекнет про пятницу-13 - в бан на**й). С болью в зубах и с крюками на коже вам зайдет играть как за маньяков, так и за сюрвов.
Желаю приятной игры, я пошел "open the box....I CAME".
*пришлите пожалуйста мне самохил в подвал..мне тут одиноко, здесь фистинг не по моей воле делают*

recommended.
Fun when you're bored to play as killer

There are perks that let the killer have no sound cues so he just pops out from behind a tree and kills you instantly. Even if you do get away at first, the killer has 1000% walk speed compared to the survivors and there's no cover or obstacles so you can't get away ever.

If you end up recovering after the killer hits you, you still have to get ressed by another player so it's pointless. 

Sometimes there are hooks with 3 hooks on them in a basement with one way in and out so he can just camp your dying body and rape anyone who tries to save you. 

The generators and healing have skill checks that are literally arcade games designed to make you lose. There's a RANDOM DELAY that's different every time you press the space bar and when you lose it resets the progress of the generators. 

There are a lot of characters and skins but you have to buy them all with real money because the developers want to milk your wallet clean like fortnite. There's a crap currency that creates the illusion that you're earning something and a good real money currency that actually gets you characters just like a gold, elixir, and gems system in clash of clans. 

The game is unplayable as survivors. Playing as the killer is the mind numbingly boring. For a game that seems professionally made, it's surprisingly bad.
Dont buy, this game is extremely unbalanced, there are multiple killers who can one shot you and you cant win against them + you get only matched with players which are a lot better than you

The game is poorly meshed and coded. Behaviour doesn't have a clue on how to balance perks, killers, and what's worse is they don't care. Most people use the same 20 perks and the rest are really there like decorations on a cake. There isn't an incentive to climb the ranks.
ахуеная игра

还是一款很好玩的游戏的，在游戏的一开始会很难受，玩人类每次都死，玩屠夫每次四跑，但是当你沉下心慢慢来的时候，情况会慢慢的好转，你可能会觉得这是个好玩的公平4v1游戏，不过随着你时长的增加，你会发现现在是人类绝对优势的情况，屠夫很难生存，这游戏的可玩性就下降了许多，能杀几个全看人类发挥的怎么样。护士上限＞车队上限＞野队上限＞屠夫上限。你可能会觉得那我练护士护士不就好了，不过你会慢慢明白的。总之来说趁打折的时候入手还是很不错的，再加几个开黑群一起愉快的开黑。这游戏还是值得一玩的。

PREMESSA : Da giocatore non competitivo (CHE GIOCA SOLO SURVIVOR CON AMICI)  ne con troppe ore in gioco questa è una recensione di cosa IO penso sia l'esperienza media. 

Iniziamo dal fatto che ci sono i soliti 10 perk sbroccati dove è la meta, non li equipaggi e sei una m3rdh4. 
Dal lato Survior, abbiamo Borrowed Time e Unbreakable. Entrambi ottenibili da Bill , il pensionato di L4D/1/2.
Il killer non ha nessun modo per capire se chi viene tirato giù dal gancio sia affetto da Borrowed Time, il survivor potrebbe semplicemente baitare un colpo oppure fare finta di avere il borrowed, tanto il killer non lo sa finchè non colpisce il survivor appena staccato dalla macelleria.

Dead hard è un'altro perk che rompe il c4zzho dove il killer deve sperare che il survivor non lo abbia equipaggiato, datochè come al solito non c'è nessun avviso prima dell'attivazione del perk.

Dal lato Killer nel frattempo, la cosa più frustrante di tutti sia assolutamente il NOED, dove se qualcuno viene preso ad endgame e viene facecamperato, azzardati a tirarlo giù dal gancio.
L'icona non è visibile finchè il killer non colpisce qualcun'altro. Quindi due ganci di facecamping mega cringe. "Basta togliere tutti i totem". Non mi interessa, io non spreco 10 minuti della mia vita per cercare dei BASTONI con dei TESCHI.

Il Ruin per i Generatori è solo fastidioso, ma almeno il totem è illuminato quindi bene o male lo distingui dallo sfondo.

Nurse Calling invece è qualcosa fuori di testa , capisci di essere in pericolo quando ti stai curando troppo tardi, datochè con il prossimo hit andrai atterra e vedrai il killer fare un 180 su di te solo perchè ti stai curando e quindi ha IL DIRITTO di sapere dove sei. 

Micheal Myers al livello 3 infinito. Direi che non c'è niente da dire no? Un killer dove per tutta la partita con un colpo manda i survivor a terra. Funny? Non penso. C'è anche il perk dove Judith's Tombstone che in combinazione semplicemente ti tira fuori dalla partita.

Ultima cosa, smettetela di aggiungere personaggi Neri visto che il trend BLM è finito

incompetent devs, every other player being a toxic asshole to both their teammates and opponents, a stale unchanging meta of the same 10 perks and game play that has barely changed in the 5 years that the game has been out.
Yet it still is my most played game on steam.
10/10

I recommend this game if you're playing with friends.

I have an intense love/hate relationship with Dead by Daylight, and I feel as though I've logged enough hours into it to write a fair review. If you're just here wondering if the community is as toxic as everyone says it is ... well, yes, it is. I wouldn't say it's any more or less toxic than the communities you'd find in CS:GO, Overwatch, Fortnite, etc. ... but post-game chat can definitely frighten off a new player.

If you're new to the game, I highly recommend playing it with one or more experienced friends who can coach you. If you don't have a thick skin or much patience, playing solo right off the bat will likely make you rage quit. That being said, a lot of people will only have fun with DbD if they're playing with friends. And that's okay and completely fair. The basis of 4v1 gameplay is cooperation, and you can't guarantee that a random is going to have your back.


I'm a survivor main, but I enjoy playing killer every once in a while. I think it's extremely important for every DbD player to experience playing killer. You'll have toxicity in-game and post-game when you're a survivor, but there's really nothing that can prepare you for post-game chat when you're the killer. I tend to minimize the chat so I don't see it, or I change my username to something friendly (which no one should have to do, but I'm a lover, not a fighter). While playing killer can help thicken your skin against the community, it's really helpful in learning to be a better teammate while playing survivor. There's also a killer for everyone. While I want to be the best with every killer in the game, I've succumbed to the fact that it's just not a possibility for me and tried every killer until I found one that matched my play style.

Many players have a lot of gripes about the developers: Every update seems to fix something but break something else, server lag is atrocious, and, lately, matchmaking is a complete joke (you're supposed to be matched with players on your skill level, but it's really not unusual to be shoved into a lobby with players way below or way above your skill level anymore). Certain perks are broken, hitboxes are not functional, and you'll be kicked from lobbies, menus, and matches, requiring you to have to restart the game completely.

If you need a friendly face to play this game with, you can add me. I'm serious. There are kind and gentle players in this game, and they're honestly the ones who kept me around when I first started playing. I'll never forget my first time playing killer in a public match. I was nervous and played terribly. Post-game chat, a more experienced player encouraged me: "You're a good killer - just watch your tracking." They hung around and gave me some advice for practicing. Granted, every post-game after that was toxic ... but that energized me enough to keep trying. I try to reciprocate that to newer players when I can.

This game makes me want to cut my nutsack open, flip it inside out, slap it on an ironing board, iron it, hit it with a fucking mallet, feed whatever is left of my balls to the developers who thought spirit was a good idea then have a fist fight with all the developers involved in the creation of survivors (fuck those guys). I want to put an aluminium baseball bat through my screen whenever I get blinded or 360'ed. Why the fuck does rank reset even exist like I'm just stumped that this games is real. Would recommend .

Actualizo: El juego esta en la puta garcha. Tras la nueva perk del caballo, el juego se vuelve 100% imposible de ganar para el killer.
Explicacion: Esa perk aumenta la velocidad a la que el surv se puede soltar del killer, tambien hace mucho mas dificil moverse, y si te caes de altura, te da 25% de progreso.
¿Que hacen entonces los survis? Cuando ven que los estas por matar, se suben al centro del mapa. Entonces ahi ya no los podes matar, porque nunca vas a llegar a un gancho, literalmente, nunca, no dan los tiempos matemáticamente hablando, para agravarlo, hay addons que hacen que haya menos ganchos, etc.
Como killer lo unico que podes hacer es intentar que se desangren, pero no te dan puntos por ello, osea que si fuiste capaz de dejarlos desangrar durante una partida de 35mins, esta la posibilidad de que ni siquiera subas de rango, un asco.
La verdad intenendible, que siendo que los survs ya estaban muy chetados, por los pallets, perks, premades y loops infinitos, pongan esa perk asquerosa a disposición. Basicamente behaviour es una Karen de survivors.

Edit: tambien agrego que en muchas ocasiones el juego se traba, mostrando su poca optimización, tengo una rx 580 8gb, 16ram, 300mb de internet y un ryzen 5 3xxx. 
Cumpliendo los requisitos recomendados con creces, no puedo jugar a 60 estables por encima de la calidad grafica 'Bajo'.

This is a message from BHVR,

Please stop complaining about our game :( 

Yes, we don't ban hackers and exploiters EVER. 
Yes, our game has been a buggy mess since 2016.
Yes, we only care about releasing cosmetics and making money off microtransactions. 
Yes, our patches are band-aids on flesh wounds, usually doing more harm than good. 
And yes, fixing this game is on low priority for us because DBD has no competition. 

But...Look! We just released the cool new killer from (horror film)! And check out this 20$ weeb bunny girl baka Feng Ming skin. Also, you can use our in-game code to get a pitiful amount of bloodpoint, helping you avoid playing our grind-fest game!

Start enjoying the game, please :) 

-Matthew Cote

La experiencia de este juego es muy variada. (50/50) 😐
Jugar de surv con amigos es divertido sin importar el resultado de la partida. Sin embargo, jugar de surv solo es de las peores experiencias que existe (aveces).
El lado del killer igualmente es muy variado, en ocasiones puedes tener una partida divertida aunque no ganes y en la próxima pueden hacerte como se les plazca (💩). 
Respecto al juego en general le hace falta MUCHA ATENCIÓN. Atención en contenido, servidores, bugs, conexión con amigos, balance de perks y ahora al SBMM. 
Los desafíos tanto de la grieta como los diarios son muy repetitivos y largos.
